dialog.text: The bottom half is a river
is there any grass or anything around the river?
There is a small strip of grass and trees directly above the river. It is a little wider on the right two thirds of the picture
is there any thing in the sky or in the river? Are there any mountains?
There is nothing in the river. There is mountains above the river that go up about halfway into the sky
How many peaks do they have? Are they steep or level?
The mountains are level all the way across, however it is a little bit taller on the left side. There is also a peak at the middle of the mountain.
How tall is the peak? Is there anything else?
The peak is not much taller than the rest of the mountain, however it is jagged. There is also a dip in the mountain halfway towards the left from the center
how deep is the dip in the mountain? is the mountain flat on the right side?
The dip goes a little less than halfway into the mountain. The rest of the mountain is a little jagged, but does not deviate much in terms of height
Are the peaks in the middle more jagged than the rest of the mountain? How many jagged pieces in the peak?
There are two jagged pieces in the peak. The rest of the mountain has very small jagged edges throughout
How high do the jagged pieces on the peak go?
They do not go high up at all. They are only high enough to be distinguishable.
Okay. what is the weather like? And is there anything else? I feel like I put everything in.
There are no clouds. The strip of trees is very narrow and is directly above a narrow strip of grass. It ends just before it hits the left side of the picture.
Okay. I tried to decrease the thickness on my drawing, but it looks like there are still a lot of trees. Is there anything else?
